    io.smallrye.mutiny.Uni<HttpResponse<T>>
    HttpRequest.sendMultipartForm(MultipartForm body)
    Like HttpRequest.send() but with an HTTP request body multimap encoded as form and the content type set to multipart/form-data.
    HttpResponse<T>
    HttpRequest.sendMultipartFormAndAwait(MultipartForm body)
    Blocking variant of HttpRequest.sendMultipartForm(io.vertx.mutiny.ext.web.multipart.MultipartForm).
    void
    HttpRequest.sendMultipartFormAndForget(MultipartForm body)
    Variant of HttpRequest.sendMultipartForm(io.vertx.mutiny.ext.web.multipart.MultipartForm) that ignores the result of the operation.
